attributes.action: Spread awareness about how ocean wildlife is slaughtered without being needed to
attributes.additional_details: Commercial fishing is a major problem because dolphins as an example are dying because they are stuck in nets and the fishermen aren’t doing anything to help them. I hope we achieve stopping commercial fishing and you will be a part of this journey.
attributes.background: Create safer fishing methods so we our seas and oceans can be protected. We want this to stop commercial fishing which is wiping out are sea life population. And killing animals unnecessarily when using nets

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about ocean wildlife but we're not exactly sure what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
